_comment: Created by ianb on 27/06/2014 16:22:06 using v2.1
title: Which organisations are responsible for the number of patients delayed?
analysis_commentary: We can see a downward trend for delays over time due to social care organisations but an upward trend for NHS organisations. For social care there is a 39% decrease in the number of patients experiencing a delay in discharge between August 2010 (1,723 patients) and April 2014 (1051 patients).
data_source: NHS England, Delayed transfer of care
